TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_D_16_i
TestCase.Purpose: This test case verifies that the eID-Client includes a meaningful human-readable error message/description into the body of the response to the browser in case the TC Token cannot be retrieved. The underlying test case is [EID_CLIENT_E_03].

Command.Text: Complete the test case and evaluate the error message/description included into the body of the response to the browser.

ExpectedResult.Text: The error message/description is meaningful and clear for the user.
